marklogic.body: Â you nailed it,,obama and his do nothing liberal controlled senate of pure radical incompetence,, and blame,, while out nation Burns from a know nothing do nothing pack of progressive union bowing liberals like obama biden,schumer, durbin,harkins, who belive they know better than we the people and we should shut and and get out of the way, like the way they did obamanannycare , massive spending, shutting down our oil production, wasting billion on the campaign donors for more failed solar and wind power, ,, failure and government motors bailouts , and their failed electric car, and BatteriesÂ with our tax dollars and for three years no budget to hide what they spent,, [[[[[MADNESS OUR NATION BEEN THREE YEARS OF MADNESS]] ON WE THE PEOPLE,,, PURE INCOMPETENCE]] [[[[[[[ABO]]]]
